CustomField.formula:
IF(AND(DATEVALUE(saleswings__Last_Visit_Datetime__c) != DATE(1970,1,1),FLOOR(NOW() - saleswings__Last_Visit_Datetime__c) = 1),TEXT( FLOOR(NOW() - saleswings__Last_Visit_Datetime__c)) & " day ","") & IF(AND(DATEVALUE(saleswings__Last_Visit_Datetime__c) != DATE(1970,1,1),FLOOR(NOW() - saleswings__Last_Visit_Datetime__c) > 1),TEXT( FLOOR(NOW() - saleswings__Last_Visit_Datetime__c)) & " days ","")
& IF(AND(FLOOR(NOW() - saleswings__Last_Visit_Datetime__c) < 1,FLOOR( MOD((NOW() - saleswings__Last_Visit_Datetime__c) * 24, 24 ) ) > 1),TEXT( FLOOR( MOD( (NOW() - saleswings__Last_Visit_Datetime__c) * 24, 24 ) ) ) & " hours ","") & IF(AND(FLOOR(NOW() - saleswings__Last_Visit_Datetime__c) < 1,FLOOR( MOD( (NOW() - saleswings__Last_Visit_Datetime__c) * 24, 24 ) ) = 1),TEXT( FLOOR( MOD( (NOW() - saleswings__Last_Visit_Datetime__c) * 24, 24 ) ) ) & " hour ","")
& IF(AND(FLOOR(NOW() - saleswings__Last_Visit_Datetime__c) < 1,FLOOR( MOD((NOW() - saleswings__Last_Visit_Datetime__c) * 24, 24 ) ) < 1,FLOOR( MOD( (NOW() - saleswings__Last_Visit_Datetime__c) * 24, 24 ) ) < 1,ROUND( MOD( (NOW() - saleswings__Last_Visit_Datetime__c) * 24 * 60, 60 ),0) > 1),TEXT( ROUND( MOD( (NOW() - saleswings__Last_Visit_Datetime__c) * 24 * 60, 60 ), 0 ) ) & " minutes ","") & IF(AND(FLOOR(NOW() - saleswings__Last_Visit_Datetime__c) < 1,FLOOR( MOD((NOW() - saleswings__Last_Visit_Datetime__c) * 24, 24 ) ) < 1,FLOOR( MOD( (NOW() - saleswings__Last_Visit_Datetime__c) * 24, 24 ) ) < 1, ROUND( MOD( (NOW() - saleswings__Last_Visit_Datetime__c) * 24 * 60, 60 ),0) = 1),TEXT( ROUND( MOD( (NOW() - saleswings__Last_Visit_Datetime__c) * 24 * 60, 60 ), 0 ) ) & " minute ","") & IF(OR(DATEVALUE(saleswings__Last_Visit_Datetime__c) <= DATE(1970,1,1),saleswings__Last_Visit_Datetime__c > NOW(),ISBLANK(saleswings__Last_Visit_Datetime__c)),"","ago")
CustomField.label: SW Since Last Visit
